mapper.insert: INSERT INTO status ( statusDate, new_users, new_companies, new_recruitmentNoticeCnt, new_registration, new_reviewBoard ) VALUES ( #{statusDate}, #{newUsers}, #{newCompanies}, #{newRecruitmentNoticeCnt}, #{newRegistration}, #{newReviewBoard} )

INSERT INTO total_status ( statusDate, total_users, total_companies, total_recruitmentNoticeCnt, total_registration, total_reviewBoard ) VALUES ( #{statusDate}, #{totalUsers}, #{totalCompanies}, #{totalRecruitmentNoticeCnt}, #{totalRegistration}, #{totalReviewBoard} )
